name: Mentimeter AB
description: Developer of an audience engagement platform designed to transform conventional presentations into interactive experiences. The company's platform is used to create add polls, word clouds, quizzes, slides, and more, and help meetings, conferences, events, and training sessions to make them more productive and effective, enabling businesses to engage audiences and inspiring leaders to talk less and listen more.
